data.title: bugs, fixes, crashes, mods, guides and improvements for every PC game
data.text:
Open hp6.exe with a hex-editor.

Search for the byte pattern 8080020000C7 and replace the following:

8002 → 000F

E001 → 7008

Save the file and start the game. If the edited file cannot be saved, try unchecking read-only or move the file to a different folder.

Notes:

For detailed instructions and other resolutions, see this video.

Download resolution.zip here.

Unzip the file and place it in the PC sub folder within the games installation folder (same folder as hp6.exe).

Start the game.

Open hp6.exe with a hex-editor.

Search for the byte pattern 398EE33F:

For 21:9, replace 398EE33F with 26B41740.

For 32:9, replace 398EE33F with 398E6340.

Then search for the byte pattern 8035FA8E3C:

For 21:9, replace 35FA8E3C with 0752AD3C.

For 32:9, replace 35FA8E3C with A3E4EB3C.

Save the file and start the game. If the edited file cannot be saved, try unchecking read-only or move the file to a different folder.

Notes:

For detailed instructions, see this video.

Open the hp6.exe with a hex-editor.

Search for the address 001D9573.

Replace 95BA0002 with 95BA0001.

Save the file and start the game. If the edited file cannot be saved, try unchecking read-only or move the file to a different folder.

Notes

For detailed instructions, see this video.
